name: tm92
effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
